title: Riot, fix thou nudity.
body:
Hi riot, I'am a mother concerned about my families wellbeing because I'm willing to literally build a wall around my child if it means that they are safe.

I'am worried about the nudity in this game, champions like {{champion:31}} , {{champion:421}}  and {{champion:121}}  are fully naked, I'm worried my child might be having sexual fantasies with your characters.

thank you.

~tumblr-username

replies.body: Omg hahhhaha why you just dont let him play league lmao xD you are so dump mother idkxD

Dude, at least pick a better champion to target.

{{champion:34}} is naked with her breasts hanging out for all of Runeterra to see.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QxciUbG9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-28T15:44:09.948+0000)
>
> Dude, at least pick a better champion to target.
> 
> {{champion:34}} is naked with her breasts hanging out for all of Runeterra to see.

{{champion:79}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Colton147,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QxciUbG9,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-08-28T20:52:57.976+0000)
>
> {{champion:79}} {{item:3070}}

Men can't ever be sexualized. Check your privilege. 

######(I'm memeing with SFW talk, that's it. Not trying to start anything.)
the title shows it's a troll guys don't fall for it
Have you seen shivana's dragon form? that ult is literaly she exposing her oversexualized and unrealistic draconian body to the world, NUDE!!!
Well that has to be a troll.

> [{quoted}](name=CauseSCIENCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QxciUbG9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-27T02:15:49.901+0000)
>
> Well that has to be a troll.

more like a satire?
